title: Hair fall
description: Amla, bhringraj, and coconut oil strengthen the scalp and reduce hair fall.
how_to: Warm coconut oil + amla powder, massage scalp for 10 mins, wash after 20 mins.

title: Dandruff
description: Neem and tea tree help control scalp infections and dandruff.
how_to: Boil neem leaves, cool, rinse scalp with neem water twice weekly.

title: Oily scalp
description: Multani mitti absorbs excess oil and keeps scalp fresh.

title: Split ends

title: Grey hair
